text.headline: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication
Web Developer, Voluntary Work
text.text:
Northeastern University, Boston, MA
Engineered a React.js and Python Flask-based search engine website, incorporating web scraping to collect and store 1 million data points in Elasticsearch, and implementing an intuitive user interface.

text.headline: Analyst Intern
text.text:
Ecrimp Technologies, Hyderabad, Telangana
Initiated inventory management by forecasting the requirement of raw materials for our manufacturing unit. Derived analytical insights to improve utilization efficiency of by-products generated by 30%. Revised the existing process planning and laid down the system to bring in output improvement by 7%

text.headline: Research Assistant, Robotics and IOT Lab, Prof. Saber Hussain
text.text:
Osmania University, Hyderabad, Telangana.
Pioneered a BCIxDL application, Cerebro‐the first‐ever go‐to‐market BCI wheelchair. Administered large‐scale data collection from 50+volunteers collecting 500,00+EEG datapoints collaborating with Georgia Southern University.

text.headline: Northeastern University Masters in Information Systems
text.text:
Expected December 2024
Pursuing Master's degree, focusing on applying technology to solve real-world problems. Taking courses in Deep Learning methods and optimization techniques.
